channel.title: Jesse Duplantis Ministries Video Podcast
channel.description: JDM's weekly video content in a mobile-friendly format. On the go or at home, JDM is about reaching people and changing lives, one soul at a time.

item.title: Discovering God’s Chosen Treasure
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Get stirred up with this transforming teaching as Cathy shows you how valuable you are to God and how the moment you accepted Jesus, you were supernaturally equipped and empowered to do what you could never do on your own.

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Ways to Give: PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jdmgiving
Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate
Text to Give: https://www.jdm.org/w-JDMTextToGive

Join TotalJDM now and get access to years of messages by Jesse and Cathy Duplantis for free!

*TotalJDM: https://total.jdm.org/  

 

© 2026 Rev. Catherine C. Duplantis

item.title: How to React to Tragedy
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Start walking in the joy of the Lord as Jesse teaches you how tragedy doesn’t have to control you. With the Word of God, you can control every trial that comes against you!

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Ways to Give: PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jdmgiving
Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate
Text to Give: https://www.jdm.org/w-JDMTextToGive

Join TotalJDM now and get access to years of messages by Jesse and Cathy Duplantis for free!

*TotalJDM: https://total.jdm.org/

item.title: Use Your Faith Voice
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Get ready to receive from God as Jesse teaches on JDM’s 2026 theme, “Use Your Faith Voice. Only Say What Faith Says” based on Romans 4:17. Learn how to succeed God’s way and accomplish all that He’s told you to do and to have.

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

item.title: Living Clean in a Dirty World
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
In this high-energy classic message, Jesse will inspire you to stand for the truth and be the one who challenges others to do the same. Learn how to follow Jesus’ example and start living clean in a dirty world today!

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

item.title: The Wonder of Forgiveness
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Do you know what the most wonderful thing that God has ever done for you is? He saved you and forgave you! Step into a new level of freedom as Jesse teaches you about the wonder of the cross of Christ.

item.title: The Idea of God Needs to be Altered
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
In this inspiring Christmas message, Jesse shares how valuable your human “flesh” body is to God. As a temple of the Holy Spirit, you were created to be His holy instrument to worship God and serve others.

item.title: The Cure For Trouble
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
What do you do when trouble comes? Satan may attack and trouble may come, but Jesus gave us a cure for that—FAITH! Jesse brings you an exhilarating message that will activate hope in your spirit and release supernatural peace in your heart as you learn how your faith is equal to all the emergencies of life

item.title: He That Hath an Ear, Let Him Hear

item.title: The Revelation That Destroyed Satan’s Plan
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
The enemy knew that Jesus was the Messiah, but he didn’t understand how God sent His Son to die for us. The Bible says that if Satan had known, he wouldn’t have crucified Him (1 Corinthians 2:8). Be filled with supernatural faith with this revelatory Easter message by Jesse.

item.title: God is Never Late, But I Sure Wish He Was Early
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Jesse is on fire as he shares deep truths of God’s Word that will strengthen, re-fortify, and focus your faith walk. You’ll understand the true value and purpose of “waiting on God” and how to stand firm on God’s Word knowing that Jesus will always be on time for you.

item.title: What Is In the Faith of Jesus? Qualities of the Christian Worker
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Do you realize that as a believer, you’ve been blessed with “the measure” of Jesus’ very own miracle-working faith to do even greater works than He did? Discover how to truly live by the faith of the Son of God and start manifesting His divine glory in every work you do!

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

item.title: What Do You Do When Everything Is Going Wrong?
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
When facing an impossible situation, what comes out of your mouth? In this inspiring Boardroom Chat, Jesse and Cathy teach you how praising God during life’s darkest times will cause you to triumph and lead others to the Lord.

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate
Text to Give: https://www.jdm.org/w-JDMTextToGive

item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Proverbs 17:22 says, "A merry heart does good like a medicine." Get ready to laugh as Jesse shares personal, humorous stories with biblical points that will lift your spirit and heal your soul.

item.title: How Long Do You Want To Live?
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
In this passionate Board Room Chat, Jesse and Cathy show you how to rightly divide God's truth so that He can fulfill His promise to you of a long, healthy, and prosperous life. You may not be able to choose your battles, but you can choose your outcome!

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries

You may not be able to choose your battles, but you can choose your outcome! item.title: Hearing God’s Voice
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Jesse shares that it doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what mistakes you’ve made in life. God loves you and He wants to talk with you! Learn the seven ways God speaks to His people and start hearing God’s voice every day.

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

item.title: Give God a Job, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Have you limited the Lord’s work in your life by tying His hands with unbelief? Jesse gives you a scriptural wake-up call that will compel you to access your faith in God and stretch your view of what He can do for you. Learn how to think BIG and give God a job—NOTHING is too hard for Him!

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Ways to Give: PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jdmgiving
Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate
Text to Give: https://www.jdm.org/w-JDMTextToGive

Join TotalJDM now and get access to years of messages by Jesse and Cathy Duplantis for free!

*TotalJDM: https://total.jdm.org/

Learn how to think BIG and give God a job—NOTHING is too hard for Him! item.title: And the Curtain Tore, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Do you realize what happened when the veil of God’s temple was torn at Christ’s crucifixion? Complete access to God Almighty was opened to you! Jesse teaches how Jesus’ atoning death at the cross tore aside all manmade restrictions and how it’s your Christian privilege to come boldly to the throne of grace anytime for your every need.

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Get ready for a fresh look at the manger and beyond as Jesse explores the different characters of Christmas in a whole new way. You’ll be inspired to live a higher life of faith as he shares his personal insights on some of the more unusual elements of the Christmas story.

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

item.title: What Will You Have Me To Do? Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Jesse encourages you as he teaches how knowing Christ intimately will lead you to new roads of duty in your walk of faith. You’ll also be inspired as you learn how God will supply the courage and strength you need to fulfill His calling on your life.

item.title: Quit Believing For What You Don't Want, Part 2

item.description:

item.title: My Testimony of Heaven, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Walk through the fields of paradise as Jesse shares, for the second time, his supernatural trip to Heaven. Be encouraged as Jesse tells of God’s great love for you, the future He has for you in Heaven, and the message He told him to give you, “Tell My people I’m coming soon!”

item.title: What Are You Doing In These Crazy Times?
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Jesse and Cathy share a powerful message from one of their Boardroom Chats that will take your faith higher, far above the circumstances of life. As a believer, you don’t have to let the craziness of the world affect you. God wants you to live in peace, strength, and with bold courage.

item.title: The Barred Gate & The Open Door, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Be inspired as Jesse delivers a wonderful Christmas message that shows how the first Adam got us locked out of the garden, but Jesus came as the second Adam to bring us back to a right relationship with God into the city with an ever-open door.

item.title: The Invasion of Time, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Timing is one of God's specialties, and Christ's incarnation was far from a shot in the dark—it was perfectly, impeccably planned! Jesse shares exciting insight that will open your eyes to see God’s strategic nature. Find out how God always shows up on time.

item.title: Courtesy: The Sister of Love, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Did you know that courtesy is the flavor of your personality? In this power-packed message, you’ll discover how courtesy possesses a divine power of charm and dignity. Be empowered to be compassionate toward others in all situations and shine the light of Jesus to the world!

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/

item.description:

item.title: Doing the Things I Can't Do, Part 2
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Discover how empowering it is to move beyond what you can do and into what God can do THROUGH you as Jesse inspires you to remove the limits and step out in faith. No matter who you are or where you come from, God CAN use you to do the impossible!
